frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-weeks-start-on-monday-again
frozen.shortDescription: ... or maybe not, and that's why the start day is configurable in the preferences.
frozen.longDescription:
... or maybe not, and that's why the start day is configurable in the preferences.

This is an updated version of the "Weeks Start on Monday" extension for newer Gnome Shells.
